class epyk.core.html.graph.GraphC3.C3Selection(report, attrs=None, options=None)¶
property draggable¶
property enabled¶

Set data selection enabled.

If this option is set true, we can select the data points and get/set its state of selection by API (e.g. select, unselect, selected).

https://c3js.org/reference.html#data-selection-enabled

property grouped¶
property isselectable¶
property multiple¶

class epyk.core.data.DataClass(report, attrs=None, options=None)¶
attr(name, value)¶

Add an attribute to the Javascript underlying dictionary

Parameters

  • name – String. The attribute name

  • value – Object. The attribute value

Returns

“Self” to allow the chains on the Python side

custom(name, value)¶

Custom function to add a bespoke attribute to a class.

This entry point will not be able to display any documentation but it is a shortcut to test new features. If the value is a Javascript object, the PyJs object must be used

Parameters

  • name – String. The key to be added to the attributes

  • value – String or JString. The value of the defined attributes

Returns

The DataAttrs to allow the chains

get(dflt=None, name=None)¶

Get tje attribute to the underlying attributes dictionary

Parameters

  • dflt – Optional. The default value of this attribute

  • name – Optional. The attribute name. default the name of the function

Returns

has_attribute(clsObj)¶

Add an extra sub layer to the data structure. The key in the object representation will be the function name

Parameters

clsObj – Class. The sub data class used in the structure definition

set(value, name=None)¶

Add an attribute to the Javascript underlying dictionary

Parameters

  • value – Object. The attribute value

  • name – Optional. The attribute name. default the name of the function

Returns

“Self” to allow the chains on the Python side

sub_data(name, clsObj)¶

Add an extra sub layer to the data structure. The key in the object representation will be the function name

Should use has_attribute is the name can be deduced from the parent function

Parameters

  • name – String. The key to be added to the internal data dictionary

  • clsObj – Object. The object which will be added to the nexted data structure

sub_data_enum(name, clsObj)¶
Parameters

  • name – String. The key to be added to the internal data dictionary

  • clsObj – Object. The object which will be added to the nexted data structure

class epyk.core.html.graph.GraphC3.JsData(report, attrs=None, options=None)¶
property types¶

This setting overwrites data.type setting: line, spline, step, area…

https://c3js.org/reference.html#data-types
